description: This file defines API routes for a Notes CRUD application using FastAPI. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and searching notes, with associated data models and database interactions.

methods.name: NotesList list_notes()
methods.description: Lists all notes ordered by most recent update.

methods.name: Note get_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its ID.

methods.name: Note create_note(payload: NoteCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided title and content.

methods.name: Note update_note(note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate)
methods.description: Updates an existing note's title and/or content.

methods.name: None delete_note(note_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: SearchResults search_notes( q: str = Query( ..., min_length=1, max_length=200, description="Search query string.", examples=["grocery"], ), limit: int = Query( 50, ge=1, le=200, description="Maximum number of results to return." ), )
methods.description: Searches notes by a query string in title or content.

ctags.name: search_notes
ctags.signature: ( q: str = Query( ..., min_length=1, max_length=200, description="Search query string.", examples=["grocery"], ), limit: int = Query( 50, ge=1, le=200, description="Maximum number of results to return." ), )
